==========
genome-mds
==========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/genome_mds.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/genome_mds

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/omics-tools/genome_mds.svg

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/genome-mds/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://genome-mds.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?version=latest

a graphical two-dimensional comparison tool for prokaryotic genomes


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://genome-mds.readthedocs.io.
